channel.title: Michael Murphy - Blog - docker
channel.description: Documentation of personal projects covering topics such as data and technology

item.title: Using Dev Containers to Standardise Development Environments
item.description: After running my own homelab for a while, I've become pretty familiar with using containers - mostly via Docker, though I may have to make the switch to podman after a recent announcement. One thing I wasn't aware of was the ability to run containers for the specific purpose of creating a development environment.
